records.name: Crown Beach Family Villas

descriptions.hotel: Crown Beach Hotel Maldives: Where Luxury Meets Serenity The Crown Beach Hotel stands as a true oasis of luxury and tranquility, offering an unforgettable escape in a breathtaking tropical paradise. Located on the shores of a pristine beach, this three-star beach hotel redefines the meaning of opulence and impeccable hospitality, creating a haven of relaxation and indulgence for discerning travelers from around the world. Nestled in an idyllic location, the Crown Beach Hotel boasts a stunning backdrop of turquoise waters and powdery white sands that stretch as far as the eye can see. Upon arrival, guests are greeted with warm smiles and a refreshing tropical drink, instantly setting the tone for a memorable stay. The Hotel's architecture seamlessly blends with the natural surroundings, incorporating local elements and traditional design, while still offering all the modern comforts one could desire. Accommodations at the Crown Beach Hotel are a symphony of elegance and comfort. Guests can choose from a range of lavish deluxe rooms and villas, each thoughtfully designed to provide the utmost privacy and convenience. The villas are a true marvel, perched on the beach, offering uninterrupted views of the ocean. For those who prefer to be closer to the beach, the beachfront villas offer direct access to the sand, allowing guests to dip their toes in the warm waters at their leisure. Inside the accommodations, no detail is overlooked. The rooms are exquisitely decorated with a blend of contemporary and traditional aesthetics, featuring plush furnishings, rich fabrics, and locally inspired artwork. State-of-the-art amenities, including spacious en-suite bathrooms, private terraces or balconies, and high-speed internet, ensure that guests experience the height of modern convenience and comfort. Beyond the luxurious accommodations, the Crown Beach Hotel excels in delivering an exceptional dining experience. The Hotel's restaurants serve a delectable array of international and local cuisines, prepared by experienced chefs using finest ingredients. Guests can savor gourmet delicacies in an elegant beachfront setting, under the stars in a romantic al-fresco ambiance, or in the privacy of their villa. The Crown Beach Hotel also caters to the adventurous spirit of its guests, offering a myriad of exciting water sports and island excursions. Snorkeling and diving opportunities abound, allowing visitors to explore the vibrant coral reefs and encounter a kaleidoscope of marine life. Guests can also embark on sunset cruises, dolphin-watching trips, or island-hopping adventures to nearby atolls, where they can immerse themselves in the local culture and traditions. As a responsible and eco-conscious Hotel, the Crown Beach Hotel takes great pride in its commitment to sustainability and environmental preservation. The Hotel implements green practices, such as energy-efficient technologies, water conservation, and responsible waste management, to ensure that the stunning natural beauty of the Maldives remains pristine for generations to come. In conclusion, the Crown Beach Hotel represents the epitome of luxury, elegance, and serenity in one of the world's most beautiful destinations. With its unparalleled accommodations, exceptional dining experiences, rejuvenating facilities, and thrilling island adventures, this Hotel promises a truly unforgettable escape for those seeking a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure in paradise. ***Property Policies*** Cancellation policy: 1 day before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay. Check in from 13:00 to 23:00. Check out before 12:00 noon. Payment upon arrival by cash. Taxes not included - 10.00% Breakfast included. No curfew.
descriptions.direction: Located in Dhiffushi, Crown Beach Hotel Maldives is near the airport and on a private beach. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Meeru House Reef and Asdhoo Island. Chicken Island Reef and Kassan Faru are two other places to visit that come recommended. With snorkeling, windsurfing, and fishing nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: At Crown Beach villas - direct access to bikini beach, exceptional service and top-notch amenities create a memorable experience for guests.Complimentary internet access is available in the hotel to ensure you stay connected during your visit. Arrange your trips to and from the airport using the hotel's convenient transportation services booking.For guests with their own vehicle, parking facilities are provided.At the hotel, utilize the convenient laundry service to maintain your preferred travel attire fresh, allowing you to pack lighter. Desire to unwind? Make the most of your visit at Crown Beach villas - direct access to bikini beach with accessible amenities such as daily housekeeping. Accommodations come equipped with all the conveniences required for a restful night's slumber.A selection of rooms at Crown Beach villas - direct access to bikini beach come furnished with air conditioning to cater to your needs and comfort. At Crown Beach villas - direct access to bikini beach, each day commences with a scrumptious breakfast offered at no additional cost. Are you inclined to prepare your own dishes? You will surely appreciate having the on-site shared kitchen available.
descriptions.other: Dhiffushi Island, Maldives: A Tropical Paradise Located in the mesmerizing archipelago of the Maldives, Dhiffushi Island stands as a true tropical paradise, beckoning travelers with its pristine beaches, turquoise waters, and warm hospitality. This small yet enchanting island offers a glimpse into the authentic Maldivian way of life, making it an ideal destination for those seeking an immersive and culturally rich escape. Dhiffushi Island is a postcard-perfect representation of the Maldives' natural beauty. Surrounded by the vast expanse of the Indian Ocean, the island boasts powdery white sands that seem to stretch endlessly along its coastline. The crystal-clear waters teem with colorful marine life, making it a snorkeler's and diver's dream come true. Despite being a popular tourist destination, Dhiffushi Island retains its traditional charm and laid-back atmosphere. Visitors are welcomed by friendly locals who proudly share their customs, traditions, and local cuisine. Strolling through the narrow sandy pathways, travelers can witness the daily life of the islanders, which revolves around fishing, boat-building, and other traditional activities. Accommodations on Dhiffushi Island are varied, offering options ranging from cozy guesthouses to boutique hotels. Unlike the large and extravagant resorts found on some of the neighboring islands, the accommodations on Dhiffushi embrace a more authentic and intimate experience, giving guests a chance to immerse themselves fully in the local culture. One of the island's highlights is the chance to savor Maldivian cuisine. Local restaurants serve an array of freshly caught seafood, tropical fruits, and aromatic spices, providing a tantalizing journey for the taste buds. It's a culinary adventure that gives travelers an opportunity to appreciate the unique flavors and influences that shape Maldivian cooking. For those seeking adventure, Dhiffushi Island offers a variety of activities. Snorkeling and diving enthusiasts can explore vibrant coral reefs teeming with colorful fish and marine creatures. Water sports like jet skiing, kayaking, and windsurfing are also readily available, ensuring that thrill-seekers can make the most of the island's aquatic wonders. As the sun sets over the horizon, the island transforms into a magical realm of tranquility. Visitors can enjoy romantic beach strolls, unwind with yoga sessions on the sand, or simply marvel at the breathtaking sunset views. The absence of city lights allows for unparalleled stargazing, making it a perfect opportunity to connect with nature's wonders. Dhiffushi Island, with its captivating beauty and warm hospitality, offers a memorable escape for travelers seeking an authentic and enriching experience in the Maldives. It's a destination that leaves an indelible mark on the hearts of those fortunate enough to wander its sandy shores, forging a connection with a tropical haven that lingers long after the journey home.
descriptions.localized: At Crown Beach villas - direct access to bikini beach, exceptional service and top-notch amenities create a memorable experience for guests.Complimentary internet access is available in the hotel to ensure you stay connected during your visit. Arrange your trips to and from the airport using the hotel's convenient transportation services booking.For guests with their own vehicle, parking facilities are provided.At the hotel, utilize the convenient laundry service to maintain your preferred travel attire fresh, allowing you to pack lighter. records.short_description: Very good accommodation. Easily accessible by car and close to the beach. Beautiful beach.

other.text: Dhiffushi Island, Maldives: A Tropical Paradise Located in the mesmerizing archipelago of the Maldives, Dhiffushi Island stands as a true tropical paradise, beckoning travelers with its pristine beaches, turquoise waters, and warm hospitality. This small yet enchanting island offers a glimpse into the authentic Maldivian way of life, making it an ideal destination for those seeking an immersive and culturally rich escape. Dhiffushi Island is a postcard-perfect representation of the Maldives' natural beauty. Surrounded by the vast expanse of the Indian Ocean, the island boasts powdery white sands that seem to stretch endlessly along its coastline. The crystal-clear waters teem with colorful marine life, making it a snorkeler's and diver's dream come true. Despite being a popular tourist destination, Dhiffushi Island retains its traditional charm and laid-back atmosphere. Visitors are welcomed by friendly locals who proudly share their customs, traditions, and local cuisine. Strolling through the narrow sandy pathways, travelers can witness the daily life of the islanders, which revolves around fishing, boat-building, and other traditional activities. Accommodations on Dhiffushi Island are varied, offering options ranging from cozy guesthouses to boutique hotels. Unlike the large and extravagant resorts found on some of the neighboring islands, the accommodations on Dhiffushi embrace a more authentic and intimate experience, giving guests a chance to immerse themselves fully in the local culture. One of the island's highlights is the chance to savor Maldivian cuisine. Local restaurants serve an array of freshly caught seafood, tropical fruits, and aromatic spices, providing a tantalizing journey for the taste buds. It's a culinary adventure that gives travelers an opportunity to appreciate the unique flavors and influences that shape Maldivian cooking. For those seeking adventure, Dhiffushi Island offers a variety of activities. Snorkeling and diving enthusiasts can explore vibrant coral reefs teeming with colorful fish and marine creatures. Water sports like jet skiing, kayaking, and windsurfing are also readily available, ensuring that thrill-seekers can make the most of the island's aquatic wonders. As the sun sets over the horizon, the island transforms into a magical realm of tranquility. Visitors can enjoy romantic beach strolls, unwind with yoga sessions on the sand, or simply marvel at the breathtaking sunset views. The absence of city lights allows for unparalleled stargazing, making it a perfect opportunity to connect with nature's wonders. Dhiffushi Island, with its captivating beauty and warm hospitality, offers a memorable escape for travelers seeking an authentic and enriching experience in the Maldives. It's a destination that leaves an indelible mark on the hearts of those fortunate enough to wander its sandy shores, forging a connection with a tropical haven that lingers long after the journey home.
